channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8260633] [macos] java/awt/dnd/MouseEventAfterStartDragTest/MouseEventAfterStartDragTest.html test failed
item.description:
The following test failed in the JDK17 CI:

java/awt/dnd/MouseEventAfterStartDragTest/MouseEventAfterStartDragTest.html

Here's a snippet from the log file:

mouseDragged: java.awt.event.MouseEvent[MOUSE_DRAGGED,(100,100),absolute(960,539),modifiers=Button1,extModifiers=Button1,clickCount=0] on frame0, hash:1101650586
dragGestureRecognized: java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent[source=sun.lwawt.macosx.CMouseDragGestureRecognizer@65683133]
The last mouse event: java.awt.event.MouseEvent[MOUSE_PRESSED,(150,150),absolute(1010,589),button=1,modifiers=Button1,extModifiers=Button1,clickCount=2] on frame0, hash:1587360103

Unexpected: java.awt.event.MouseEvent[MOUSE_DRAGGED,(100,100),absolute(960,539),modifiers=Button1,extModifiers=Button1,clickCount=0] on frame0, hash:1265071244

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fix request [11u]

I backport this for parity with 11.0.25-oracle.
No risk, only tests change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

Fix request [17u]

I backport this for parity with 17.0.13-oracle.
No risk, only tests change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

Fix request [21u]

I backport this for parity with 21.0.5-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.
